summary: A young woman's murder provokes reflection on the ugliness and villainy of modern society.
cast: Eri Fukatsu|Satoshi Tsumabuki|Denden|Akira Emoto|Hisashi Igawa|Mansaku Ikeuchi|Hanae Kan|Sabu Kawahara|Kirin Kiki|Suzuki Matsuo|Ken Mitsuishi|Hikari Mitsushima|Yoshiko Miyazaki|Kento Nagayama|Hiroshi Oda|Masaki Okada|Sansei Shiomi|Kinuo Yamada|Takashi Yamanaka|Kimiko Yo
title: Akunin
